name: The Last Demon
description:
(WARNING THIS IS YAOI YOU WILL PLAY A GUY)

After days of traveling you stop by a village and find a demon?

Join Delek as you travel with him back home and find love on the way! Thats if you choose the right options

the game is short sad to say bit this is only episode one and a test to see if its worth finishing ^^ so there will be more and depending on popularity the second episode may come out faster then this one (This one was a month and 2 weeks in the making)

Also for all those that get this game looking for like sex scene there is no real nudity or descriptive sex scenes sorry about that Y_Y

music by:

Too Late (ft. Azoora) by Stefan Kartenberg

Little Penguin (ft. Debbizo) by Gurdonark
